a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (25)

p.k:
Barbabravo is not feeling well / Be patient Barbabravo... Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him.
Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed? (2020)
